name: dask-cluster
description: This package deploy a dask cluster composed of a scheduler and n workers. This is easy to use it inside jupyter notebook : daskdev/dask-notebook
preInstallNotes: Warning : data are not stored on this service. This service may reserve a lot of cpu and memory. Remove it asap
postInstallNotes: Your python dask client must connect to the dask scheduler on port 8786. There is an UI available to monitor the activity of the cluster on the scheduler. There is nothing to see in workers
